title: Add polkachu validator
summary: Polkachu is founded by a group of technology professionals who focus on providing the highest quality infrastructure and services for public blockchain networks. Today, Polkachu supports 125 blockchain networks as validator / node operator. $172M crypto assets are staked with Polkachu on blockchains such as Aptos, Celestia, CosmosHub, dYdX, Injective, NEAR, and Solana. We look forward to working with the XRP community!
